description:
## Model Family Registration

Registers a family of related models or components that share code.

**Prerequisites:** None — submit before Stage 3 or 4 if needed.

**Result:** Family ID (used in Stage 3 for Component Families, Stage 4 for Earth System Families)

![Workflow](https://mermaid.ink/svg/pako:eNq9Vgtv2jAQ_iuWUacNJTySAG2kbeoo0EqgVYVt2saETGKIVceOEqctffz3nRNgaSmsrbpZSmL7Xp_vfLm7wZ70KXbxjMtLLyCxQv2zsUDZ2NtDxye94z48I3SIhqPDXsdF7YCIOUUqoChRC04RUdliKpWSIVISBWwecHhUQdHnSDEpEhcNFZnTupF_LQMNusu5vfw6WmolmaTTeUyiYCn2c4zL5WyK6uXyGP9a8ekx1ORezHzUppwn6A0aamnmF_io8LertwrqrQ31Pouppw-BRp_umbUIyB3LmF1LoQhHvfsmc54p8HylsWLeJsc2UINuBmgAEeKoS0LGF09G1RkOQLgDAYXDLRJFw6WGB_JtbaMtw0gKKtQmz06H2QWH2Zvx0OQc_NrAUzU7Bc3OpmZnpXm7vmEdmeaH23mpVDJQAu9bHak11SIZ2csJ9p_9abZ_8XDfztmlmLE5OjkCmrOigauRWQHqLHOeyfwitd3dJNpFoB5n3rmGO8aBUlHiVqtzpoJ0WvFkWP3WPjs124OT02onScCBjHAzO7l5JL00hB2io19lSZLSpCro5UeIdcSJou_13Z94kAsTIvxJkidDZRGC19Bkyok4f4ABnPLqIIJ1YkxAVZTmrLD6K5jp64O5WGbgM6HYr48k1HwZjCwvdll3_pH1HTb1lf5HR87zYIdtSJj_a7pQpY463cMv_RGUuu_9znD9a8rKXF6BYBHLc-qWbNs28rl5yXwVuFZ0ZcwY566AiD4iar1IdNB9uUX75aLOM0QfbRdM1PGZbgxYgjgTVPcFXt45rNsD9BbiqgOHZKrQTMZIFJqHd1sdUas1m553H5VdRIUNHNI4JMyHzuYmw4ihRQnpGLsw9emMpBxq0VjcAStJlRwuhIddFafUwLFM5wF2Z4QnsEojH27QESNQncIVi_5hrNmh8NC4LVOhsFuvGzgi4oeUa15YYvcGX2HXalZsq9WotVpWy2pa9ZZt4AVs1_YrLecARs1uOM3GQePOwNeZhlplv9UwMAVXyniQd2pZw3b3G0OWGqw)

> ⚠️ **Read the guidance (▶) before filling in** — incorrect entries will be rejected. To modify an existing entry, check the [family files](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/tree/main/model_family).

label: Family Name
description: Short identifier for this model family.

label: Family Type
description: Whether this is a coupled Earth System family or single-domain Component family.

label: Description
placeholder:
1. Scientific focus and approach
2. Common code base and physics
3. How family members differ

label: Scientific Domains
description: All domains covered by any family member.

label: Year Established
description: Year the family was first developed.

label: Representative Member
description: A well-known configuration from this family.

---

## Issue Handling

**After submission:**
- Creates `model_family` entry
- Earth System Families can be referenced in Stage 4 (Model)
- Component Families can be referenced in Stage 3 (Model Component)
- Track progress in issue comments
